info.title: Title
info.aboutMe: I am a passionate developer who is open to continuous learning in software development. Experienced in modern web technologies with strong problem-solving skills...

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Developing web applications using .Net Core and C#.

jobs.title: Intern
jobs.description: Gained practical experience in web application development, user interface design and implementation, database management

university.name: Pamukkale University
university.description: Comprehensive education in data structures, algorithm analysis, software engineering, and web technologies.

university2.name: Anadolu University
university2.description: Comprehensive education in data structures, algorithm analysis, software engineering, and web technologies.

personal.title: Finance Assistant
personal.description: A .NET Core application developed for personal finance management. Helps users track their expenses and income.

personal.title: Chopin, Instrument Store
personal.description: Chopin consists of an API and a client, and it is continuously being developed. It is an e-commerce site for musical instrument sales. The API is built with .NET Core, and the client side is created with React.

personal.title: Chat App
personal.description: I developed a messaging application in Windows Form for chatting with friends, utilizing RabbitMQ for communication.

contributed.title: Test Monitor
contributed.description: A project I developed for Etihad, featuring customizable endpoints that regularly send requests and log them. The project is divided into API and Client sides. The API was built using .NET Core with PostgreSQL as the database. The Client side was developed with React and Tailwind was used for styling.

contributed.title: Doc.Client
contributed.description: Developed a Postman-like site where API endpoints of connected services can be tested with JSON requests. The application was built with React, and Bootstrap was used for the design.

contributed.title: Reservation API
contributed.description: Developed an API application for hotel search and reservation, built using .NET Core.

contributed.title: TourVisio API
contributed.description: I contributed to bug fixing and feature development in the API project. I worked on the payment system, resolving payment-related bugs and integrating with banking systems.

contributed.title: B2B
contributed.description: A client integrated with an API project built using .NET Core MVC.

contributed.title: Media
contributed.description: A .NET Core application developed for media file management.

contributed.title: Womom
contributed.description: A frontend application developed for maternity education. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA) using React.

contributed.title: SanCC
contributed.description: A .NET Core application that triggers scheduled tasks. Accounting integration was implemented.
